definition: between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
setting-up exercises during the break (between classes)

sentences.english: At school I have some friends. We have orts after cla .
sentences.chinese: 在學校我有一些朋友，課間我們做一些運動。

sentences.english: The students played tag during recess.
sentences.chinese: 學生們在課間休息時玩抓人遊戲。

sentences.english: But I was learning really quickly. I got used to it after a break.
sentences.chinese: 還好我學得快，過了課間休息後我就順應過來了。

sentences.english: Love is passing a cup of tea to teachers during the break.
sentences.chinese: 愛是課間休息時先生給老師送去的一杯清茶。

sentences.english: During the break, the sportsground rang with happy shouts.
sentences.chinese: 課間休息時，操場上回響着歡快的叫聲。

sentences.english: During breaks between classes, that's where you'll usually find the burnouts.
sentences.chinese: 課間休息時，你在吸菸室裏看見的通常就是吸毒族。

sentences.english: At play-time, Becky and I went to the wood together.
sentences.chinese: 課間休息時，貝奇和我一起去了樹林。

sentences.english: In school, you don't want to be the kid playing alone during recess.
sentences.chinese: 在學校，不希望在課間休息時那位孤獨的孩子。

sentences.english: After the second class, we do setting-up exercises during the break.
sentences.chinese: 下第二節課後我們又做課間操。

sentences.english: We often have a pleasant break.
sentences.chinese: 我們經常度過愉快的課間休息。

sentences.english: The children ran around the playground, letting off steam.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們課間在操場上到處奔跑，渲泄多餘的精力。

sentences.english: Break-time snacks in this primary school are created by dietitians.
sentences.chinese: 這個小學的課間餐都是請營養配餐員設計調配出來的。

sentences.english: Between classes the Senior 1 English Office is a mad-house.
sentences.chinese: 課間高一英語備課組的辦公室熱鬧得掀開了鍋。

sentences.english: During the class activity to be active, kicking shuttlecock skipping a strong body.
sentences.chinese: 課間活動要活躍，踢毽跳繩強健體。

sentences.english: Pack away your books , children . it ' s time for break.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們，把書收起來，課間休息時間到了。

sentences.english: One day he called me into his room during the recess.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，在課間休息的時候，他把我叫到他的辦公室。

definition: to finish class/to get out of class
to dismiss students at the end of the school day
to attend a class/to go to a lecture
to attend school as a day student
to clap one's hands/to clap each other's hands/high five
that's all/just this and nothing more
kiosk/snack counter/retail department or section inside a larger business
